channel.title: software on Steckschwein
channel.description: Recent content in software on Steckschwein

item.title: Software
item.description: Repositories All sources for steckOS, BIOS, firmware, decoder and also schematics and layouts can be found in our github repositories: All software (steckOS, BIOS, libraries, tools, games, stuff): https://github.com/Steckschwein/code Hardware (Schematics, PCB Layouts, VHDL, Firmware): https://github.com/Steckschwein/hardware Steckschwein emulator: https://github.com/Steckschwein/steckschwein-emulator Steckschwein site: https://github.com/Steckschwein/steckschwein.github.io Tools We almost exclusively use Open Source-Software to design and code for the Steckschwein. cc65 Extensive suite of cross development tools for almost every 6502 based platform. We mostly use ca65 because of the linker.
